features.featureTitle: Update the Car Rentals page vehicle cards to display two pricing modes for each vehicle: per-km and per-day. Sedan: ₹13/km and ₹2,500/day (mark with a 'Most Popular' badge). SUV: ₹21/km and ₹5,000/day. Each vehicle card must clearly present both pricing options so the user can see and select the mode they prefer.

Update the Car Rentals booking form fare estimator to support both pricing modes. When 'per-km' mode is selected, capture estimated distance in km and calculate fare using Sedan ₹13/km or SUV ₹21/km. When 'per-day' mode is selected, capture number of days and calculate fare using Sedan ₹2,500/day or SUV ₹5,000/day. Display the estimated fare dynamically as the user inputs values. Store the selected pricing mode, distance/days, and estimated fare in the car rental inquiry submitted to the backend.

Ensure the Car Rentals booking form includes the existing T&C checkbox acknowledgment that the user must check before submitting. The checkbox must link to the Terms & Conditions page and prominently display the notice: 'Without driver — if anything happens to the vehicle, the consumer is fully liable for all repair and associated costs.' The form must not be submittable unless the checkbox is checked.

Refresh the Car Rentals page UI to be more premium and user-friendly: improve card layout typography hierarchy, use clean borders and subtle background contrasts (no box shadows), ensure vehicle selection, pricing mode toggle, driver option, and booking form are laid out clearly and responsively on both mobile and desktop, consistent with the overall black/white/grey premium MakeMyTrip/Uber aesthetic.
